section.heading: Weightings applied to counts of students enrolled at certain grade levels.
section.text: The student counts at certain grade levels and in certain programs shall be weighted to provide an amount per student differing from the basic foundation level in accordance with the following schedule:

annotations.text: Short title: Section 4001 of D.C. Law 18-111 provided that subtitle A of title IV of the act may be cited as the “Uniform Per Student Funding Formula for Public Schools and Public Charter Schools Amendment Act of 2009”.
Section 4001 of D.C. Law 20-61 provided that Subtitle A of Title IV of the act may be cited as the “Funding for Public Amendment Act of 2013”.
annotations.annotation: Applicability of D.C. Law 20-61: Section 11001 of D.C. Law 20-61 provided that, except as otherwise provided, the act shall apply as of October 1, 2013.

The 2015 amendment by D.C. Law 21-36 substituted “2016” for “2015” in the schedule.
The 2015 amendment by D.C. Law 20-155 rewrote the schedule.
The 2013 amendment by D.C. Law 20-61 rewrote the schedule.
The 2012 amendment by D.C. Law 19-168 rewrote the schedule.
D.C. Law 14-190 rewrote the section which had read as follows: Grade levels Weighting Total per pupil allocation in FY
